name: Crazy Forest 2
description:
Crazy Forest 2 is a game where the action takes place in the Wild Forest. Blow up and shoot a mad horde of animals! Your only mission is to survive and free your world from the animals gone mad! The great game is back, with more animals, and more madness! Kill 'em all.

- Blow the crazed animals up!
- A variety of playable characters and different types of weapons!
- Even crazier due to multiplayer.
